Description: The name of the location. This needs to be unique as having the same location name more than once leads to issues when using some Cozero features.
The ID of the business unit the location is assigned to.
The ID of the user who is responsible for the location.
The address of the location. This will be geocoded. The result of the geocoding is returned in the attribute 'geolocation'.
A tag to assign to the location. It's possible to assign several tags to one location, for simplicity we stick to a single tag per location in the example data though.
